sources.title: Sex (1920) Pre-Code | Silent Drama | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A broadway actress uses her sex appeal to ruin a marriage only to dump her lover for a richer prospect.

Director: Fred Niblo
Writer: C. Gardner Sullivan 
Stars Louise Glaum, Irving Cummings, Peggy Pearce
Genres: Classics, Drama, Silent, Pre-Code
